string.text:
A compact and lightweight assault rifle designed for special forces and law enforcement, offering high firepower in a small frame. Its simple yet durable design allows for reliable performance in urban combat and close-quarters engagements. With its ability to mount suppressors and optics, it is a versatile weapon suited for both stealth operations and direct confrontations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]KBP Instrument Design Bureau

A suppressed designated marksman rifle based on the 9A-91 platform, built for silent, precise engagements at medium range. Featuring an integral suppressor and compatibility with high-powered optics, it is ideal for reconnaissance and covert operations. Its compact size and low recoil make it highly effective for eliminating targets without revealing the shooter’s position.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]KBP Instrument Design Bureau
